description:
Youtarou Rindou is a resident of Border`s Tamakoma Branch. Youtarou is not shy, often does things he`s not supposed to, and is prone to outbursts. He is puerile, though, as he believes Raijinmaru is a dog. Youtarou possesses a large amount of Trion, enough to trigger a Side Effect.
(Source: World Trigger Wikia)
Youtaro is a little kid with messy black hair framing his face. He usually wears a red hoodie with black sleeves, black pants and white shoes. He also wears a helmet with goggles, made for him by Reiji.
Youtaro is not shy, and more often than not does things he`s not supposed to, and is prone to outbursts. He is puerile, though, as he believes Raijinmaru to be a dog. He is frequently getting into fights, for which reason Kizaki created a helmet for him, to protect him from himself
He`s the son of Rindou Takumi and owner of the Capybara Raijinmaru.
name: Rindou Youtarou
